allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: BulldogTrivia - Interactive Trivia Game Application

Features:
- Multi-round trivia game with presentation mode
- Support for multiple question formats \(Standard, Music, Crossword, Before & After, Connection, Tiebreaker\)
- Spotify integration for music questions
- Team management and scoring system
- Real-time presentation window with 16:9 aspect ratio
- Presenter notes for questions
- Slide-based presentation with keyboard navigation
- Save/load trivia games with backwards compatibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
